duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide outstanding customer service with food preparation, serving for the cafeteria/kitchen/coffee shop, and catering & dining area cleaning for patrons of the City View Café, City View Coffee Shop or Catering.
Responsible for ensuring food is prepared adequately and on time and ensuring their area is adequately stocked, prepared, and cleaned for service.
Assist in keeping the food production area, service area, storage rooms, kitchen area, and customer dining areas clean and organized to prevent situations of foodborne illness.
Make recommendations to management regarding processes and inventory quantities.
Promote a culture that supports diversity and inclusion in all forms as well as providing excellent customer service continuously to all internal and external contacts.
